message: Accept this generous offer and we can end the game!
I'm sure you can do better than that. This is my offer, accept it and we can be done with this.
Don't wait for a better offer, take this one!
This time, I'm offering you a fair share. Take it or we'll keep playing until we're both losing money.

I think we're both better off ending this now. This is my final offer.
